document_data.name: Flammuldinath Thuldoum
document_data.mainbody: '''Flammuldinath "Firefingers" Thuldoum''' was a mage in [[Thentia]] in {{yearlink|1367}} and in {{yearlink|1373}}.
document_data.Description: As of 1373 [[DR]], to [[Taegan Nightwind]], Firefingers looked like "some fortunate child's doting grandfather"; he was stooped, wrinkled, had a white beard, and wore robes of scarlet, orange, and gold.
document_data.Relationships: Firefingers was the teacher of [[Maganus]]. He came to him just before the [[Time of Troubles]]; the tutor found him even then wizened before his years and full of anger. The sorceresses [[Jannatha Goldenshield]] and [[Baerimel Dunnath]] were also trained by him.
document_data.History: Firefingers was one of the mages in Thentia assisting [[Karasendrieth]]'s party in decoding [[Sammaster]]'s notes about the [[Rage of Dragons]] in 1373 DR. He also may have told the [[Hero of Daggerford]] what he knew of Maganus that same year.
